Title: Requires public vessels which carry passengers to be covered by insurance or a surety bond covering injury or death to the passengers
Summary: Requires public vessels which carry passengers to be covered by insurance or a surety bond covering injury or death to the passengers.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the navigation law, in relation to requiring certain policies of insurance for public vessels which carry passengers
